1.0.0.name: wordpress/translate-this-blog-translator
1.0.0.description:
A free translation button provided by Translation Cloud allowing visitors to translate your website into over 35 languages. Translate This is powered by Bing and combines all its translation functionality into one small, easy to use button. Once installed, the button will appear at the top of every post on the main page, as well as at the top of the individual posts.

Translate This supports over 35 languages.
